TextView.android:text: We are pleased to share with you that the organizers of the 72nd Annual Conference of IRIA have negotiated discounted rates from several hotels for the duration of 16 Jan 2019 (Check in) to 20 Jan 2019(Check out).The details of such arrangements are provided below..Currently we are working on the best procedure for making payments for renting the rooms and the details will be available on this website shortly.In the meanwhile,please note the following important information.
Rooms will be booked subject to availability.
The organizers are only facilitating discounted rates for the delegates.If you are getting lower rates from any other portal, please inform the organizers of the same.
Full refund of money will be done until 30 September 2018 for any cancellations.
Thereafter,refunds will be subject to the policy of individual hotels and delegates will need to contact the concerned hotel.
The rental charge will be inclusive of the currently applicable taxes.Any changes in the tex structure will have to be dealt by the guests/delegates directly with the hotel.
All bookings to be done through website only using credit/debit card.Please DONOT send any cheques/drafts for hotel booking to the organizers.
The organizers will not have any responsibility regarding the service being offered by the hotels.
Anyone reading extra beds can contact the
Shuttle bus service will be provided for the delegates from select(not all)hotels.
Delegatesre are advised to visit the websites of the respective hotels and check for facilities before making any reservations.
